name: Warriors Valor
description:
The warriors must prove their valor on the arena to Valkyrie recruit them to fight on the coming Ragnarok.

How to play: W,A,S,D (movement), F (attack) and shift (dash)

Team: Bruno Medeiros (Game Designer, Level Designer, Programmer, 2D artist and 2D Animator) and Pietro Failache (Sound Composer)

Themes chosen: easy to play hard to be good and retell a tale  

#easytoplayhardtobegood #retellatale
